thread.title: This Morning's Research Reports on Chemicals Stocks -- ChromaDex, Rayonier Advanced Materials, Tronox, and Univar

author: cnbc.com
title: This Morning's Research Reports on Chemicals Stocks -- ChromaDex, Rayonier Advanced Materials, Tronox, and Univar
text:
NEW YORK, March 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on CDXC, RYAM, TROX, and UNVR which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Pre-market today, WallStEquities.com focuses on the Diversified Chemicals group, which comprises largely of intermediate producers of a broad array of chemicals and industrial gases. Under assessment this morning are four major industry players, namely: ChromaDex Corp. (NASDAQ: CDXC), Rayonier Advanced Materials Inc. (NYSE: RYAM), Tronox Ltd (NYSE: TROX), and Univar Inc. (NYSE: UNVR). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
ChromaDex
Irvine, California-based ChromaDex Corp.'s stock finished Wednesday's session 2.53% higher at $5.26 with a total trading volume of 234,533 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 21.20% in the past month and 94.81% over the past year. The stock is trading 15.30% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of ChromaDex, which discovers, acquires, develops, and commercializes patented and proprietary ingredient technologies, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 48.34.
On March 06 th , 2018, ChromaDex announced that its management is scheduled to present at the 30 th Annual ROTH Capital Partners Conference on March 12 th , 2018, at 7:30 a.m. PT, with one-on-one meetings held throughout the day. The conference is being held from March 11 th , 2018, to March 14 th , 2018, at The Ritz-Carlton in Dana Point, California. Get the full research report on CDXC for free by clicking below at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CDXC
Rayonier Advanced Materials
On Wednesday, shares in Jacksonville, Florida headquartered Rayonier Advanced Materials Inc. recorded a trading volume of 746,580 shares. The stock ended the session 2.19% lower at $19.67. The Company's shares have advanced 7.60% in the last month, 6.04% in the previous three months, and 49.02% over the past year. The stock is trading 1.10% above its 50-day moving average and 19.93% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of the Company, which manufactures and sells cellulose specialty products in the US, China, Japan, Canada, Europe, Latin America, other Asian countries, and internationally, have an RSI of 50.24.
On February 23 rd , 2018, Rayonier Advanced Materials announced that its Board of Directors has declared a Q1 cash dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock of the Company. The dividend is payable on March 30 th , 2018, to stockholders of record on March 16 th , 2018. Download our actionable research report on RYAM at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=RYAM
Tronox
Stamford, Connecticut-based Tronox Ltd's shares closed the day 0.30% higher at $20.06. The stock recorded a trading volume of 2.23 million shares, which was higher than its three months average volume of 1.58 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 12.13% in the last month and 12.70% over the past year. The stock is trading 0.73% below its 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Tronox, which produces and markets titanium bearing mineral sands and titanium dioxide pigment in North America, Europe, South Africa, and Asia/Pacific, have an RSI of 50.26.
On March 01 st , 2018, Tronox's Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.045 per share, payable on March 26 th , 2018, to shareholders of record of the Company's Class A and Class B ordinary shares at the close of business on March 12 th , 2018. Register for your free report coverage on TROX at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=TROX
Univar
Shares in Downers Grove, Illinois headquartered Univar Inc. finished 0.92% lower at $30.00. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.88 million shares, which was higher than its three months average volume of 988,420 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 9.53% in the last month and 0.77% in the previous three months. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 1.20% and 1.85%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Univar have an RSI of 60.42.
On February 13 th , 2018, research firm SunTrust upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Hold' to 'Buy'.
On February 20 th , 2018, Univar, which distributes commodity and specialty chemical products, and related services worldwide, has entered into a strategic long-term agreement with Cargill's Food Ingredients & Bio Industrial business in the United States and Canada. Pat Rogers, Cargill's commercial leader, North America – Food Ingredients & Bio Industrial, said: "This partnership will bring improvements to supply chain, e-commerce, technical applications support and other critical components that bring value to the overall customer experience." Get the free research report on UNVR at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=UNVR
--
